resources.string: FourWords is a word creation game that is going to constantly keep you on your toes.
Tap the buttons to create a word.
Hit score to score the word and add it to your word list.
If you make a mistake, hit clear to start your word over.
After you enter four words, your game board will shuffle.
You have three minutes to create as many words as you can. The longer the word, the more points it\'s worth.
Be careful though. Enter a word that\'s not in the dictionary, you\'ll lose a point.
